General.Name: Taiwan Styrene Monomer Corp
General.Description: Taiwan Styrene Monomer Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells styrene monomer, para-diethyl benzene, toluene, and ethyl benzene in Asia and Europe. The company operates through Plasticization, Investment, and Other segments. Its products are used in electrical appliances, machines, electronics, automobile, packaging, etc. The company primarily serves the manufacturers of polystyrene, acrylonitrile-butadiene-styrene resins, and synthetic rubber. It also offers investment and piping engineering services. In addition, the company provides residential building and industrial plant development rental services; operates hotels; manufactures and sells chemical and plastic raw materials, as well as electric components; and offers educational, information, software, and data storage consulting services. Taiwan Styrene Monomer Corporation was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
